definition: erhua variant of 一塊|一块[yi1 kuai4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: PUGILISTS and aesthetes are not necessarily in opposing corners.
sentences.chinese: 拳擊家和美學家未必就湊不到一塊兒。

sentences.english: If you combine all that effort into one, you should have a lot more effect.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把它們都捏到一塊兒，你就會有大得多的影響。

sentences.english: It's not like I have 180 friends that I can go hang out with.
sentences.chinese: 不象有180個可以一塊兒出去玩的朋友。

sentences.english: One of the biggest disrupters of sleep is the pulling and tugging of sheets and blankets.
sentences.chinese: 倆人一塊兒睡的時候，最煩的就是拉被單和揪毯子了。

sentences.english: All the colors were running together and becoming mud brown!
sentences.chinese: 所有的顏色都跑一塊兒，變成泥巴一般的棕色了。

sentences.english: Please bring your wife along next time.
sentences.chinese: 請你下次帶你夫人一塊兒來。

sentences.english: I have lunch at a restaurant with my colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 我跟同事一塊兒在一家餐館喫午飯。

sentences.english: Come, Fernand, won't you return to Marseilles with us?
sentences.chinese: 走，弗爾南多，你不和我們一塊兒回馬賽嗎？

sentences.english: Families would go to church and return home to eat together around the table.
sentences.chinese: 全家人會去教堂，然後回家圍聚在餐桌旁一塊兒進餐。

sentences.english: This is to learn Chinese together.
sentences.chinese: 就是跟大家一塊兒學漢語。

sentences.english: The cars telescoped after the train crashed.
sentences.chinese: 火車相撞後，車廂疊擠到一塊兒了。

sentences.english: It's O. K. I can come with my friend.
sentences.chinese: 沒問題，我可以和我的朋友一塊兒來。

sentences.english: Don’t let your spiritual beliefs interfere with your work.
sentences.chinese: 別讓精神信仰跟工作混到一塊兒。

sentences.english: I have a cake, then I eat it.
sentences.chinese: 我有一塊兒蛋糕，然後把它喫掉。

sentences.english: I'd like to go with you; however, my hands are full.
sentences.chinese: 我很想和你一塊兒去，可是我忙不過來。

sentences.english: But, luckily, he came back again in ten minutes' time, and then we all set out.
sentences.chinese: 幸虧他不到十分鐘就回來了，於是我們一塊兒動身。
